data.current_summary: Generate pdf file from url using the excellent tool wkhtmltopdf.
data.summary_suggestion: Convert URL to PDF using wkhtmltopdf
data.description_suggestion: Converts a URL or HTML content to a PDF document using the wkhtmltopdf rendering engine. Accepts a WkHtmlToPdfRequestDto containing the source URL/HTML, rendering options, and optional PDF metadata. Returns a PDF file (binary) or Base64-encoded PDF string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Supports custom page sizes, margins, headers, footers, and other wkhtmltopdf-specific rendering options.
data.reasoning: The current summary contains informal language ('excellent tool') inappropriate for API documentation. The description is completely empty, leaving AI agents unable to understand inputs, outputs, or operation effects. The improved version clarifies: (1) the operation's purpose (URL/HTML to PDF conversion), (2) the input schema and what it contains, (3) the output format and how it varies based on Accept header (consistent with PdfResponseDto pattern in API), (4) key capabilities and options supported. This enables AI agents to determine when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Basic method to verify api is up and running
data.description_suggestion: Health check endpoint to verify that the PdfBroker.io API is operational and accessible. Returns a success response if the service is running. Use this endpoint to monitor API availability and connectivity before making PDF processing requests.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague and uses informal language ('Basic method'). Description is completely missing. Added clarity about the health check purpose, expected behavior, and practical use case for AI agents to understand when to call this endpoint.

message: Operation 'post_/api/pdf/xslfo' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but description is missing entirely. Added details about Base64 encoding requirements, resource handling, response format options, and metadata support to help AI agents understand input/output expectations and available options.

data.current_summary: Create pdf-file from complete XSL-FO document.
data.description_suggestion: Generates a PDF document from a complete XSL-FO (Extensible Stylesheet Language Formatting Objects) document. Accepts the XSL-FO document as a Base64-encoded string along with optional resources (images, fonts, etc.) also Base64-encoded. Returns the generated PDF file, which can be retrieved as binary data or as a Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Supports PDF metadata configuration.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description is missing entirely. Added details about Base64 encoding requirements, resource handling, response format options, and metadata support to help AI agents understand input/output expectations and available options.

message: Operation 'post_/api/pdf/xslfowithtransform' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is present but description is missing. Added explanation of the transformation process (XSL-FO template + XML data), Base64 encoding requirements, resource handling, response format options, and metadata support for better AI agent understanding of this two-document workflow.

data.current_summary: Create pdf-file from transforming xml document with Xsl-Fo transform document.
data.description_suggestion: Generates a PDF document by applying an XSL-FO transform stylesheet to an XML data document. Accepts both the XSL-FO transform document and XML data document as Base64-encoded strings, along with optional resources (images, fonts, etc.) also Base64-encoded. The transform is applied to merge the XML data with the XSL-FO template to produce the final PDF. Returns the generated PDF file as binary data or Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Supports PDF metadata configuration.
data.reasoning: Summary is present but description is missing. Added explanation of the transformation process (XSL-FO template + XML data), Base64 encoding requirements, resource handling, response format options, and metadata support for better AI agent understanding of this two-document workflow.

data.current_summary: Generate an image of to provided pdf file
data.summary_suggestion: Convert PDF pages to image files
data.description_suggestion: Converts one or more pages from a PDF document into image files. Accepts a PDF file and conversion options (page selection, image format, resolution, etc.) as specified in PdfToImageOptions. Returns image file(s) as binary data or Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Supports configurable output format, DPI, and page range selection for flexible image generation.
data.reasoning: Summary has grammatical error ('of to') and is vague about output format. Description is completely missing. Added clarity about page conversion capability, configurable options, response format flexibility, and practical parameters to help AI agents understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'post_/api/pdf/pdfconcat' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but has double period. Description is missing entirely. Added details about input format (list of PDFs), processing order, content preservation, and response format options to help AI agents understand the concatenation workflow and expected results.

data.current_summary: Concatenate multiple pdf files into single pdf file..
data.description_suggestion: Merges multiple PDF documents into a single consolidated PDF file. Accepts a list of PDF documents (as Base64-encoded strings or file references) via PdfConcatenationRequestDto. Concatenates the PDFs in the order provided, preserving all content, formatting, and metadata from source documents. Returns the merged PDF file as binary data or Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but has double period. Description is missing entirely. Added details about input format (list of PDFs), processing order, content preservation, and response format options to help AI agents understand the concatenation workflow and expected results.

message: Operation 'post_/api/pdf/pdfwritestring' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear but description is missing. Added details about input parameters (page number, coordinates, font options), use cases (annotations, watermarks), and response format options to help AI agents understand the text overlay capability and available customization options.

data.current_summary: Write text on a page in a pdf document.
data.description_suggestion: Adds text content to a specified page within an existing PDF document. Accepts a PDF document, text string, page number, position coordinates, and font styling options (font family, size, style, color) via PdfWriteStringRequestDto. Returns the modified PDF document with the text overlay applied as binary data or Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Useful for adding annotations, watermarks, or dynamic text to PDF pages.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added details about input parameters (page number, coordinates, font options), use cases (annotations, watermarks), and response format options to help AI agents understand the text overlay capability and available customization options.

message: Operation 'post_/api/pdf/weasyprint' has semantic quality issues: not_actionable, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is too long and mixes marketing language with technical details. Description is missing entirely. Reorganized summary to be concise and action-oriented, moved subscription requirement to description, clarified input/output formats, and added context about use cases and supported standards for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Generate pdf file from html/url using Weasyprint. Requires paid subscription. This is our premium pdf generator. It is the most accurate and feature rich pdf generator we have with support for pdf/a-1b, pdf/a-2b, pdf/a-3b, pdf/a-4b and pdf/ua-1.
data.summary_suggestion: Generate PDF from HTML/URL using Weasyprint (premium)
data.description_suggestion: Generates a PDF document from HTML content or URL using the Weasyprint rendering engine. This is the premium PDF generator offering superior accuracy and comprehensive feature support. Accepts HTML content or URL via WeasyPrintToPdfRequestDto. Supports advanced PDF standards including PDF/A-1b, PDF/A-2b, PDF/A-3b, PDF/A-4b, and PDF/UA-1 for archival and accessibility compliance. Returns the generated PDF as binary data or Base64-encoded string when Accept header is set to 'application/json'. Requires active paid subscription. Ideal for complex HTML layouts, CSS styling, and standards-compliant document generation.
data.reasoning: Summary is too long and mixes marketing language with technical details. Description is missing entirely. Reorganized summary to be concise and action-oriented, moved subscription requirement to description, clarified input/output formats, and added context about use cases and supported standards for better AI agent decision-making.
